content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Good evening, Maryam. I am glad we are discussing the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for my precious apartment? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the lowest price possible for the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
